channel.title: [Updated] Runescape 3 HiScores [Development Thread]
channel.description:
With people coming out with high revision servers, I think an updated hiscores system is much so needed. So, here it is, in development.
[size=18pt]Table of Contents[/size]
[ul][li]I. Current Progress[/li] [li]II. Development Log[/li] [li]III. Still needs work[/li] [li]IV. Images and Goodies[/li] [li]V. Download Links and Packages[/li] [li]VI. Credits[/li][/ul]
[size=18pt]I. Current Progress[/size] The template has been ripped, cleaned, fixed, images, css, and javascript given relative filepaths. Database structure and server-side instruction have been completed.
[size=18pt]II. Development Log[/size] [code] - Runescape Hiscores site ripped completely. - Deleted unnecessary pages and images. - Removed features that won't be in this revision (such as clan rankings) - Cleaned the HTML in pages to reduce size, optimize performance, and simply to just clean stuff up. - Cleaned CSS files and reduced to a single CSS file. - CSS file reduced from 3,725 CSS Selectors to 300. (3,427 selectors were unneeded, or unused) - CSS file reduced from 335KB to ~25KB - PHP classes created. (ie. class.Overall.php, class.Personal.php) - PHP file /inc/settings.php created for various different settings. - More un-needed images were deleted. - PHP scripts for pages, overall, and comparing in progress. [/code]
[size=18pt]Updates[/size]
As of June 8th, 2014 @ 8:44am [code] - Pages are completely working. - 'Go To' for pages is also working. - Various security and protections have been added. - Protection for if the page doesn't exist is working. [/code]
As of June 8th, 2014 @ 9:28am [code] - Staff Members have been blocked from the highscores, [/code]
[size=18pt]III. Still needs work[/size] [code] - Finish PHP scripts for comparing two members. - Write a tutorial for installing everything, with requirements. - Implement a line or two of code to block out staff members. - Test the final system, and write tutorials for different server revisions. - Offer a few modifications or themes. - Release to public for download. [/code]
[size=18pt]IV. Images and Goodies[/size] [spoiler] [size=16pt]Landing/Home Page[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jti5OK6.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dscvfKt.png[/img] [size=16pt]Overall Hiscores Page[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sW3eexy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YZJGgkv.png[/img] [size=16pt]Skill Specific Rankings[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iEuj8zd.png[/img] [size=16pt]Player Comparison[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/W0lPiM2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/V4Bq1lN.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=18pt]V. Download Links and Packages[/size] [i]Coming Soon![/i]
[size=18pt]VI. Credits[/size] - Runescape 3 for their awesome site design.

item.title: [Updated] Runescape 3 HiScores [Development Thread]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Pwnd:

Sometimes I feel people just spend a ton of time making threads for their projects… and they haven’t even started teh project.

I made this development thread about half way through the project. I only updated it once before I found it pointless. This project has been completed, tutorials, download links, and images can be found here, in the Server Tutorials section.

Read full topic

item.title: [Updated] Runescape 3 HiScores [Development Thread]
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

With people coming out with high revision servers, I think an updated hiscores system is much so needed. So, here it is, in development.

[size=18pt]Table of Contents[/size]

[ul][li]I. Current Progress[/li]
[li]II. Development Log[/li]
[li]III. Still needs work[/li]
[li]IV. Images and Goodies[/li]
[li]V. Download Links and Packages[/li]
[li]VI. Credits[/li][/ul]

[size=18pt]I. Current Progress[/size]
The template has been ripped, cleaned, fixed, images, css, and javascript given relative filepaths. Database structure and server-side instruction have been completed.

[size=18pt]II. Development Log[/size]

- Runescape Hiscores site ripped completely.
- Deleted unnecessary pages and images.
- Removed features that won't be in this revision (such as clan rankings)
- Cleaned the HTML in pages to reduce size, optimize performance, and simply to just clean stuff up.
- Cleaned CSS files and reduced to a single CSS file. 
- CSS file reduced from 3,725 CSS Selectors to 300. (3,427 selectors were unneeded, or unused) 
- CSS file reduced from 335KB to ~25KB
- PHP classes created. (ie. class.Overall.php, class.Personal.php)
- PHP file /inc/settings.php created for various different settings.
- More un-needed images were deleted.
- PHP scripts for pages, overall, and comparing in progress.

[size=18pt]Updates[/size]

As of June 8th, 2014 @ 8:44am

- Pages are completely working. 
- 'Go To' for pages is also working.
- Various security and protections have been added.
- Protection for if the page doesn't exist is working.

As of June 8th, 2014 @ 9:28am

- Staff Members have been blocked from the highscores,

[size=18pt]III. Still needs work[/size]

- Finish PHP scripts for comparing two members.
- Write a tutorial for installing everything, with requirements.
- Implement a line or two of code to block out staff members.
- Test the final system, and write tutorials for different server revisions.
- Offer a few modifications or themes.
- Release to public for download.

[size=18pt]IV. Images and Goodies[/size]
[spoiler]
[size=16pt]Landing/Home Page[/size]


[size=16pt]Overall Hiscores Page[/size]


[size=16pt]Skill Specific Rankings[/size]

[size=16pt]Player Comparison[/size]


[/spoiler]

[size=18pt]V. Download Links and Packages[/size]
Coming Soon!

[size=18pt]VI. Credits[/size]

  • Runescape 3 for their awesome site design.

Read full topic
